name: KEFITEVD Mens Short Sleeve Polo Shirt Quick Dry Sports Outdoor Sports Polo Shirt with Glasses Holder Button Down Lightweight Summer, khaki
reviews: Our team was in Niamey, Niger from May-September 2021.  Temperatures reached 108F.  We wore this shirt on a daily basis, when working, both inside and outside.  Compared to other similar shirts, these shirts had the best combination of proper appearance (collars/polo), utility (able to hand glasses on chest and put pencils or pens in the sleeve pocket), breathability (felt the coolest of several brands in the heat of 108F), dried reasonably fast, easy to clean in a shower or bucket, and a very comfortable fit.  The material tended to snag more than some other materials on other shirts, but those other shirts felt hotter.  If you are looking for a decent shirt that is presentable and functional this is a great work shirt.
